body:
https://ruqqus.com/+AgainstHateGuilds ([archive](https://web.archive.org/web/20200818224919/https://ruqqus.com/+AgainstHateGuilds))

Sidebar:

>Preemptive squatting lol

>A strong person stands up for himself, a stronger person stands up for others. A sonofabitch Virtue signals that he stands for others

Current guildmaster: @earlyadopter

A more AHS-like guild is +AgainstChudGuilds, but it doesn't seem very serious.
body_html:
https://ruqqus.com/+AgainstHateGuilds (archive)

Sidebar:

Preemptive squatting lol

A strong person stands up for himself, a stronger person stands up for others. A sonofabitch Virtue signals that he stands for others

Current guildmaster: @earlyadopter

A more AHS-like guild is +AgainstChudGuilds, but it doesn't seem very serious.

guild.description:
When someone creates a guild just to make sure no one else has it

***

Added on 2020/12/02:

Also see +HijackedGuilds and +SiegedGuilds!

***

Update on 2021-01-29:

If you want to be the GM of this guild, make a post here.
